# Edge case FIX messages for special scenario testing
# Format: description|message

# Unicode in symbol (should work - gets uppercased)
unicode_symbol|37=ORD|55=αβγ|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00

# Very long order ID
long_order_id|37=ORD-2024-01-15-VERY-LONG-ORDER-IDENTIFIER-12345678901234567890|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00

# Zero quantity (edge - should validate or fail based on model)
zero_quantity|37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=0|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00

# Very small price (penny stocks)
penny_stock|37=ORD|55=PENNY|54=1|32=10000|31=0.0001|60=20240115-10:00:00

# Duplicate tags (last should win)
duplicate_tags|37=ORD1|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|37=ORD2

# Unknown tags mixed in
unknown_tags|37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|9999=unknown|8888=value

# Value with equals sign
equals_in_value|37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|58=Reason=test

# Message with trailing delimiter
trailing_delimiter|37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|

# Message with leading delimiter
leading_delimiter||37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00

# Mixed SOH and pipe (unlikely but possible)
mixed_delimiters|37=ORD	55=AAPL|54=1	32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00
